issues.message: Year has non-standard format `2008--2025`.
issues.suggestion: Use `year={YYYY}` (or `YYYYa`, `YYYYb`) and put extra text in `note`.

issues.message: Required field `journal` is missing.
issues.suggestion: Add `journal={...}` (or standardize to `journaltitle`, then normalize style).

issues.message: Required field `school` is missing.
issues.suggestion: Add `school={...}`.

issues.message: Mixed use of `address` (349) and `location` (9).
issues.suggestion: Choose one location field style and normalize.

issues.message: Mixed use of `journal` (362) and `journaltitle` (5).
issues.suggestion: Choose one field style for articles and normalize across the bibliography.

issues.message: Mixed use of `year` (806) and `date` (1).
issues.suggestion: Normalize to house style (typically keep `year`, optionally also `date` when needed).
